```py
>>> data = {'col_1': [3, 2, 1, 0], 'col_2': ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']}
>>> pd.DataFrame.from_dict(data)
 col_1 col_2
0      3     a
1      2     b
2      1     c
3      0     d 
```

```py
>>> data = {'row_1': [3, 2, 1, 0], 'row_2': ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']}
>>> pd.DataFrame.from_dict(data, orient='index')
 0  1  2  3
row_1  3  2  1  0
row_2  a  b  c  d 
```

```py
>>> pd.DataFrame.from_dict(data, orient='index',
...                        columns=['A', 'B', 'C', 'D'])
 A  B  C  D
row_1  3  2  1  0
row_2  a  b  c  d 
```

```py
>>> data = {'index': [('a', 'b'), ('a', 'c')],
...         'columns': [('x', 1), ('y', 2)],
...         'data': [[1, 3], [2, 4]],
...         'index_names': ['n1', 'n2'],
...         'column_names': ['z1', 'z2']}
>>> pd.DataFrame.from_dict(data, orient='tight')
z1     x  y
z2     1  2
n1 n2
a  b   1  3
 c   2  4 
```
